A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
You have a lot of reviews to read. Some of them will be great. I'll just add one non-spoilery thing:

I *liked* how they handled Leia and Carrie Fisher. From the first camera shot to the shot that a lot of people will complain about to the final closing credits\, they showed her grace and how much she brought to this universe. As an homage\, it's perfectly on point and beautifully executed.

My biggest beef with the movie: the humor frequently falls flat often by having bad timing.
